name: Myrtlewood Manor
description:
Myrtlewood Manor is a short retro-esque adventure game about solving the mystery of your newly inherited land. Explore the labyrinthian myrtlewood manor and uncover its secrets.

This retro-style atmospheric mystery will take you all around the Myrtlewood estate. From the spooky woods to the depths of the manor itself you'll encounter various unsettling elements that explain why no one has visited this place in decades...

~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

LookMouseWalk
W, A, S, DSprintShiftCrouchCtrl (not yet implemented)JumpSpacePauseEscInteractE (not yet implemented)

~~~~~~~~~~

Currently supported languages:

EnglishFully supported

For a more retro feel I recommend playing at a lower resolution like 640 × 360.

~~~~~~~~~~

Note: This is a work in progress title. Nothing is final.

Buy me a coffee if you want to support me ;)
